1370: Ghodekin moved to Op Havick1.A.10 after marriage.
Got married to Reynildis at age 25 in 1370.
1372: Had a daughter with Reynildis, Ermegardis, at age 27.
1373: Had a son with Reynildis, Loduicus, at age 28.
1374: Had a son with Reynildis, Isbrandus, at age 29.
1375: Had a son with Reynildis, Rembrandus, at age 30.
1376: Lost his wife Reynildis while she was giving birth to Mense in 1376.
Became caretaker of Ermegardis, Loduicus, Isbrandus, Rembrandus, Mense at age 32.
